transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Ji Dul sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji subah se baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Sir kya dikkat aa gayi lead vagera nahi consume kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: To ladka chala gaya gaon bitu.
Executive: Haan unse kal meri baat hui thi wo bol rahe hain ki main out of station hu mujhe char panch din lagega abhi aane mein. Hyderabad gaya hai na sir wo?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan kal unse meri message pe baat hui thi to bol rahe hain ki Hyderabad aaya hu mujhe kaam hai mujhe panch chhe din lagega. To sir aapke paas android phone hai na?
Customer: Hai.
Executive: To usme IndiaMART ka app to hoga hi aapke phone mein.
Customer: Haan hai.
Executive: To abhi aap IndiaMART ka app open kariye bataye. Call mera speaker pe kar dijiye aur IndiaMART ka app open kariye. Main aap hi se karwa leti hu kyuki na aap karenge nahi na to ye listing visibility aapki ghat jayegi. Maine unse bola kal to keh rahe hain ki main to bahar hu main sir se ek baar baat karta hu agar kar lenge wo to thik hoga. But I think unhone aapko call nahi kiya hoga jo bhi tha.
Customer: Haan open nahi kiya hai.
Executive: Achha open kar diya IndiaMART?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Usme dekhiye usme lead dikh raha hoga CITI Sugar Tricandy ka.
Customer: Ye kya?
Executive: Sugar CITI Sugar soft Tricandy ka.
Customer: Sugar Tricandy.
Executive: Hmm. Uspe na jo contact by now ka ek option likha hoga contact by now click kariye.

Customer: Isme to 2 pm hot spicy noodles aaya hai.
Executive: Kya aaya hai sir?
Customer: 2 pm hot spicy noodles.
Executive: To aap noodles mein karte hain abhi?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To usko contact by now pe click kariye.
Customer: Achha.
Customer: Kiya. Waha pe dekhiye ek chota sa link send karne ka option aa raha hoga whatsapp ki tarah.
Customer: Haan. Usko send kar dijiye.
Customer: Successfully. Reply send successfully dikhaya. Haan phir usko cut kariye aur phir dusra lead consume kariye.
Executive: Teen lead consume kariye sir aaj aap. Tabhi ho payega aapka start.
Customer: Isko hima nagaland se iska noodle hima nagaland.
Executive: Haan ye sara meghalaya side ka hi hai waha pe aap deal karte hain ya.
Customer: Nagaland ka hai.
Executive: Ji ek lead aur consume kariye aap.
Customer: Shillong wala.

Customer: Haan reply successful ho gaya. Haan ek aur dekhiye ek ye biscuit aaya hua hai Kohima ka.
Customer: Kaha se dikh raha hai mujhe to nazar nahi aa raha hai. Ek aur koi lead consume kar lijiye do kar liya na aapne.
Customer: Haan. Ek aur kariye ek aur.
Customer: Haan kar diya. Ek aur kar liya teen ho gaya sir? Ji.
Executive: Haan abhi ek aapke paas na lead manager ka option dikh raha hoga. Dikh raha kya jo three line diya na three line.
Customer: Haan. Upper left side mein us three line pe click kariye.
Customer: Three line pe kya click kiya haan. Waha pe dekhiye aapko option aa raha hoga lead manager ka ek.
Customer: Lead manager. Lead manager nahi hai to. Yeha pe likha hai search by lead. Uske niche hoga dekhiye lead manager likha hoga. Latest by lead ke niche mein my list balance. Transaction history wallet performance.
Executive: Sir kis side mein aapne click kiya left side wale three line pe click kiya ki right side wale three line pe?
Customer: Right side wala mein. Nahi nahi left mein left mein dekhiye three line de raha hoga upper corner mein.
Executive: Achha achha achha left mein nazar aa raha hai. Haan dekhiye us lead manager mein jayenge na to abhi jo aap lead consume kiye hain unka details aapko dikhega. Kaun kaun sa aapne lead consume kiya hai. To jab main phone rakh dungi ya phir jab bhi bhi aap free rahiyega na to un teen lead jo aapne consume kiya hai ek baar customer ko call laga lijiyega.
Executive: Achha achha. Thik hai? Haan aap customer customer se baat kar lijiyega na ki unki kya query hai unko chahiye ki nahi chahiye matlab kis rate mein chahiye ye bhi aap logo ka ek baat hota hai customer se normally. Ek baar aap baat kar lijiyega thik hai sir? Thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Aur jab tak wo nahi aate hain tab tak aap hi lead vagera consume kar liya kijiye phir wo jab aayenge to karenge baki kyuki agar nahi karenge na sir to ye band ho jayega aapka na isliye keh rahi thi.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai madam. Thik hai sir kar lijiyega sir thik hai? Ji ji. Okay sir thank you sir. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was not consuming buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive guided customer to consume buyleads.

- Executive explained how to check lead manager.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call the customers from lead manager.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, app, lead manager
